wikipedia_page.main: Dame Alison Margaret Peacock,  (née Mann; born 17 October 1959) is a British educator, public speaker, writer and best known originator of the Learning Without Limits approach to education. She is the Chief Executive of the Chartered College of Teaching as well as a trustee of Teach First and a columnist for The Times Educational Supplement.
